dcterms:description: Electronic Health Records (EHRs) are patientsâ€™ clinical notes in digital form and contain personal contact information, medical history, laboratory results, and treatment plans. They allow for the organization and analysis of vast amounts of structured and unstructured data.
dcterms:title: Electronic Health Records (EHR)

dcterms:creator: K. S. Kornman
P. N. Papapanou
dcterms:description: The American Academy of Periodontology (AAP)/European Federation of Periodontology (EFP) 2018 classification of periodontitis provides a multidimensional staging and grading system for diagnosing periodontitis, including levels of Stage, Grade, and Extent.
dcterms:title: American Academy of Periodontology (AAP)/European Federation of Periodontology (EFP) 2018 classification of periodontitis

dcterms:creator: P. I. Eke

dcterms:description: The National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES) 2009-2014 provides data on periodontitis prevalence among US adults, offering insights into the oral health status of the population.
dcterms:title: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey 2009-2014
